SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hm_offer o JOIN hm_product p ON o.product_id = p.id JOIN hm_offer_price op ON op.offer_id = o.id JOIN hm_seller_store s ON s.id = p.seller_id WHERE p.state_id = 'ACTIVE' AND o.state_id = 'ACTIVE' AND op.sale_price IS NOT NULL AND (op.sale_start_date IS NULL OR op.sale_start_date <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AND (op.sale_end_date IS NULL OR op.sale_end_date >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
AND LOWER(p.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%'))
AND LOWER(s.seller_name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', #{sellerName}, '%'))
